aw://45f73e67e6f20dbc3a2ea2c20f687c1c97effc35e0915aaab97c338d92e52b55","dweb:/ipfs/QmPTyMerdUEMPvHJRJeptoMECThFG4ysjtjw2uvrUr74K8"]},"lib/fx-portal/contracts/tunnel/FxBaseChildTunnel.sol":{"keccak256":"0x65240356e9e35cb9706211aeac438b4247e8f902b72f7e52322c0c88eecf32b6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a7dd25dfa5de39a48e5e64a962431c6d4f09fe6f286e2cca9bf62d606dab509f","dweb:/ipfs/QmNW9yT1eMriPzGUGFyQEGutjJFyodtZEmXDZZxVbaXssy"]}},"version":1}

params._l2MessageRelayer: L2 message relayer bridging contract address (fxChild).

returns.amount: Drained amount to the owner address.

getBridgingDecimals().details: Gets the maximum number of token decimals able to be transferred across the bridge.

migrate(address).details: Migrates funds to a new specified L2 target dispenser contract address.

processDataMaintenance(bytes,bool).details: Processes the data manually provided by the DAO in order to restore the data that was not delivered from L1.

params.data: Bytes message data that was not delivered from L1.
params.updateWithheldAmount: True, if withheld amount update is required (must be used if there is no bridge issue).

syncWithheldAmount(bytes).details: Syncs withheld token amount with L1.

params.bridgePayload: Payload data for the bridge relayer.

updateWithheldAmountMaintenance(uint256).details: Updates withheld amount manually by the DAO in order to:         [1] Account for not recorded `processDataMaintenance()` amounts;         [2] Withheld amount update after balance migration to a new contract.

drain().notice: For cross-bridge leftovers and incorrectly sent funds.

migrate(address).notice: The contract must be paused to prevent other interactions.         The owner is be zeroed, the contract becomes paused and in the reentrancy state for good.         No further write interaction with the contract is going to be possible.         If the withheld amount is nonzero, it is regulated by the DAO directly on the L1 side.         If there are outstanding queued requests, they are processed by the DAO directly on the L2 side.

processDataMaintenance(bytes,bool).notice: All the staking target addresses encoded in the data must follow the undelivered ones, and thus be unique.         The data payload here must correspond to the exact data failed to be delivered (targets, incentives, batch).         Here are possible bridge failure scenarios and the way to act via the DAO vote:         - Both token and message delivery fails: re-send OLAS to the contract (separate vote), call this function;         - Token transfer succeeds, message fails: call this function;         - Token transfer fails, message succeeds: re-send OLAS to the contract (separate vote).

updateWithheldAmountMaintenance(uint256).notice: The amount here must correspond to:         [1] The exact withheldAmount minus the accumulation of all the previous             unique amounts deposited via `processDataMaintenance()` function execution;         [2] Final OLAS balance of this contract address.
